amendment.description: To exclude 25 percent of gain on sales or exchanges of land or water interests to any nonprofit entity for any charitable purpose.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 527 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 38. Record Vote Number: 127.

Amendment SA 527 proposed by Senator Nickles. (consideration: CR S5009-5011) To exclude 25 percent of gain on sales or exchanges of land or water interests to any nonprofit entity for any charitable purpose.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 527 proposed by Senator Nickles.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 527 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 38. Record Vote Number: 127.
